import React from 'react';
import {Container,Grid,Box,styled,Paper,CardMedia} from '@mui/material';
import Navbar from './Navbar';
import headerjpg from '../assets/headerImage.png'
import BgImg from '../assets/bg.JPG'
const Item = styled(Paper)(({ theme }) => ({
    backgroundColor: theme.palette.mode === 'dark' ? '#1A2027' : '#fff',
    ...theme.typography.body2,
    padding: theme.spacing(1),
    textAlign: 'center',
    color: theme.palette.text.secondary,
  }));

function Header(props) {
    return (
      
        <React.Fragment>
                <Navbar/> 
      <Container maxWidth={false} disableGutters  sx={{}}>
   <Paper sx={{ backgroundImage: `url(${BgImg})`,
    backgroundRepeat: 'no-repeat'}} >
      <Box  sx={{ flexGrow: 1 ,backgroundColor:' rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8)'}}>
      <Grid container spacing={2}>
        <Grid   container
  spacing={0}
  direction="column"
  alignItems="center"
  justifyContent="center"
  style={{ minHeight: '100vh' }} item xs={6}>
          <Box sx={{ typography: 'subtitle2' }}>subtitle2</Box>
      <Box sx={{ typography: 'body1' }}>body1</Box>
      <Box sx={{ typography: 'body2' }}>body2</Box>
        </Grid>
        <Grid  spacing={0}
  direction="column"
  alignItems="center"
  justifyContent="center"
  style={{ minHeight: '100vh' }}item xs={6}>
        <CardMedia
        component="img"
        sx={{ width: '100%',height:'auto' }}
        image={headerjpg}
        alt="Live from space album cover"
      />
        </Grid>
      
      </Grid>
    </Box></Paper>
    
        </Container>
<Container>
        <Box  sx={{ flexGrow: 1 }}>
      <Grid container spacing={2}>
        <Grid   container
  spacing={0}
  direction="column"
  alignItems="center"
  justifyContent="center"
  style={{ minHeight: '100vh' }} item xs={6}>
          <Box sx={{ typography: 'subtitle2' }}>subtitle2</Box>
      <Box sx={{ typography: 'body1' }}>body1</Box>
      <Box sx={{ typography: 'body2' }}>body2</Box>
      </Grid>
      </Grid>
      </Box>
      </Container>
        </React.Fragment>
    );
}

export default Header;
